title: Trump order prompts removal of report on missing and murdered Indigenous people from federal websites
description: The administration of U.S. President Donald Trump removed a report on missing and murdered Native Americans, calling it “DEI content.”
content:
Claim:
The administration of U.S. President Donald Trump removed a report on missing and murdered Native Americans, calling it DEI content.
